mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`ADDRESS`, t1.`APPLICANTID`, t1.`BIRTHDAY`, t1.`BLOODTYPE`, t1.`BZ`, t1.`CADIDATEID`, t1.`CERTIFICATENUMBER`, t1.`CERTIFICATETYPE`, t1.`CHECKRESULT`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CSD`, t1.`CYM`, t1.`CZ`, t1.`CZ2`, t1.`CZ3`, t1.`CZ4`, t1.`CZ5`, t1.`DEGREETYPE`, t1.`EDUCATIONLEVEL`, t1.`EDUCATIONSTUDYMODE`, t1.`ELINKURL`, t1.`EMAIL`, t1.`ENTRANTDATE`, t1.`GENDER`, t1.`GRADUATIONDATE`, t1.`GWLB`, t1.`GZBT`, t1.`GZJSSJ`, t1.`GZKSSJ`, t1.`HIGHESTDEGREE`, t1.`HJDZ`, t1.`HKLX`, t1.`HOBBIES`, t1.`ISABROAD`, t1.`ISBLACKLIST`, t1.`ISBLACKLISTREASON`, t1.`JKZK`, t1.`JLDSPYJ`, t1.`JLDSPYJYY`, case when t1.`JZPSPYJ` in ( '通过' ) then '' else t1.`JZPSPYJ` end AS `JSPYJ_RLSB`, t1.`JZBSPYJ`, t1.`JZBSPYJYY`, t1.`JZPSPYJ`, t1.`JZPSPYJYY`, t1.`MOBILE`, t1.`NAPXM`, t1.`NAPXMJGWMC`, t1.`NATION`, t1.`NATIVEPLACE`, t1.`NF`, t1.`NL`, t1.`NQDLDHTQX`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t11.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t31.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t21.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t51.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`OTHERFILE`, t1.`PCMPROFILEID`, t1.`PCMPROFILENAME`, t1.`PCMYDGZMXID`, t1.`PERSONNELFILEPLACE`, t1.`PHASEINFO`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`POLITY`, t1.`PROFILETYPE`, t1.`QZFJ`, t1.`QZSM`, t1.`RDSJ`, t1.`RESIDENCESTATE`, t1.`RGJYTG`, case when t1.`PROFILETYPE` in ('25') then '10' WHEN t1.`PROFILETYPE` in ('30','55','58','60','61','63') THEN '20' WHEN t1.`PROFILETYPE` in ('50') THEN '30' WHEN t1.`PROFILETYPE` in ('62') THEN '40' else '' end AS `RLSB_YPZZT`, t1.`RPR`, t1.`RTSJ`, t1.`RZQD`, t1.`R_CERTNAMES`, t1.`R_INITIALIZEAPPLYDATE`, t1.`R_LASTDISCIPLINE`, t1.`R_LASTSCHOOL`, t1.`R_SCHOOLIS211`, t1.`R_SCHOOLIS985`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SFTGCP`, t1.`SFXZBJNBRY`, t1.`SFXZY`, t1.`SFZ`, t1.`SYQDQSJ`, t1.`SZYJTJ`, t1.`TJQK`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WBBM`, t1.`WBGW`, t1.`WBZW`, t1.`WBZZ`, t1.`WBZZJGDM`, t1.`WEDSTATE`, t1.`WORKBEGINDATE`, t1.`XKML`, t1.`XXXZ`, t1.`XZC`, t1.`XZNF`, t1.`YGBH`, t1.`YGLX`, t1.`YGLXSHGZ`, t1.`YJSNF`, t1.`YWZDJBS`, t1.`YYDJ`, t1.`YYDJMC`, t1.`YZBM`, t1.`ZCZS`, t1.`ZCZS2`, t1.`ZP`, t1.`ZPLX`, case when t1.`PROFILETYPE` in ('20','22','50','60','63') then '1' else '0' end AS `ZTCODE`, t1.`ZTYY`, t31.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PCMPROFILE` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t11 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t11.ORMDUTYID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t21 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t21.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t31 ON t1.ORMORGID = t31.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t51 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t51.ORMPOSTID ) t1 where pcmprofileid=#{id}
